import React,{useState} from 'react'; import './Main.css'; function Upsc() { const [number,setNumber]=useState(""); const [name,setName]=useState(""); const [email,setEmail]=useState(""); const handleSubmit=(event)=>{ alert('Form is submitted successfully'); event.preventDefault(); } return ( <>
